title: AYNAT FUN Magnetic Drawing Board for Kids & Toddlers with Beads and Magnet Stylus Pen - Magnetic Tablet Toy for Airplane & Car Ride Activities for Kids
feature_bullets: [" A No-Mess Toy for Kids: Make long drives bearable and keep your youngsters entertained without getting messy!
